scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && ([ -f artisan ] || (echo 'Laravel backend not initialized in backend/. Create it first (artisan missing).' && exit 1)); if command -v php >/dev/null 2>&1; then php artisan serve; else /mnt/c/xampp/php/php.exe artisan serve; fi
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n frontend,backend -c cyan,green "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
